attributes.action: to stop closure of deaf schools and forcing disabled into main stream schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to stop closure of deaf schools and forcing disabled into main stream schools .
there are few deaf specialist schools left in this country and those that are left need not close.
i my self attended ovingdean hall school in brighton a specialist school for deaf children.
and i,m shocked to hear its plight and that of the present children attending
it is understood that local govenment and local education authoritys are preventing deaf children from being given the chance in life to improve their education and change their life style them self and to improve their confidence in this hearing world.
but instead they are being forced in to mainstream school that neither has the factillitys or the specailist trained teachers to give this sort of teaching or confidence with out labeling them problem children which they are not.
ovingdean hall school has past out many a student whom could not speak  in being able to speak and with high grades to go on to college and some obtain degrees in further education and do well in life ahead .
close this school and you will go back to the dark ages off the early 1900s 
stop it now before its all to late...
this also applys for other deaf school that are left to
